### (i) $H^3$ Rank LSTM vs. GRU

```{r data_01}
# Vioplot Data
acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg <- readRDS("../acc_ebit_h3_rankavg.rds")

# Stacked Barchart data
acc_ebit_h3 <- readRDS("../acc_ebit_h3.rds")
acc_ebit_h3_melt <- data.table::melt(
  acc_ebit_h3,
  id.vars = c("company", "type", "h"),
  measure.vars = c("rank_smape", "rank_mase", "rank_smis"),
  variable.name = "metric",
  value.name = "rank"
)
acc_ebit_h3_melt[, metric := factor(
  metric,
  levels = c("rank_smape", "rank_mase", "rank_smis"),
  labels = c("sMAPE (rk)", "MASE (rk)", "sMIS (rk)")
)]
acc_ebit_h3_melt[, type := factor(type, levels = rev(unique(type)))]
```

#### Mean Rank LSTM vs. GRU (only)
```{r accuracy_vioplot}
{
  par(mfrow = c(3, 1), mar = c(0.5, 4, 2, 1), oma = c(4, 1, 0.2, 0.2))
  for (metr in c("sMAPE (rk)", "MASE (rk)", "sMIS (rk)")) {
    vioplot(
      rank_mean ~ h, 
      data = acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg[type == "LSTM" & metric == metr],
      col = "palevioletred", 
      plotCentre = "line",
      side = "left",
      xlab = NULL,
      ylab = metr
    )
    vioplot(
      rank_mean ~ h,
      data = acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg[type == "GRU" & metric == metr],
      col = "lightblue", 
      plotCentre = "line",
      side = "right",
      add = TRUE
    )
    points(
      1:length(levels(acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg$h)),
      sapply(levels(acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg$h), function(horizon) 
        median(acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg[type == "LSTM" & metric == metr & h == horizon, rank_mean])
      ), pch = 21, col = "palevioletred4", bg = "palevioletred2"
    )
    points(
      1:length(levels(acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg$h)),
      sapply(levels(acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg$h), function(horizon) 
        median(acc_ebit_vioplot_rank_avg[type == "GRU" & metric == metr & h == horizon, rank_mean])
      ), pch = 21, col = "lightblue4", bg = "lightblue2"
    )
  }
  legend("bottom", fill = c("palevioletred", "lightblue"), legend = c("LSTM", "GRU"), title = NULL)
  par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
}
```

#### Stacked Ranks LSTM vs. GRU (only)
```{r rank_stack_01_gru}
# Re-Factor rank and type for "correct" ordering
acc_ebit_h3_melt[, rank := factor(rank, levels = sort(unique(rank), decreasing = TRUE))]

ggplot(acc_ebit_h3_melt, aes(y = type, fill = factor(rank))) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  facet_grid(h ~ metric) +
  scale_x_discrete(expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "RdYlBu") +
  xlab(NULL) + ylab(NULL) + 
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Rank", nrow = 1, reverse = TRUE)) +
  gg_stackbar_theme
```

#### Mean Rank LSTM vs. GRU (incl. Baselines, ARIMA, Simple, ARNN, RNN)
```{r data_vioplot_02}
# EBIT 02 (rank)
acc_ebit_01 <- readRDS("../acc_ebit_01.rds")
acc_ebit_01_rank_melt <- data.table::melt(
  acc_ebit_01,
  id.vars = c("company", "type", "h"),
  measure.vars = c("rank_smape", "rank_mase", "rank_smis"),
  variable.name = "metric",
  value.name = "rank"
)
acc_ebit_01_rank_melt[, metric := factor(
  metric,
  levels = c("rank_smape", "rank_mase", "rank_smis"),
  labels = c("sMAPE (rk)", "MASE (rk)", "sMIS (rk)")
)]
# EBIT 02 (rank) Average
acc_ebit_01_rank_avg <- acc_ebit_01_rank_melt[
  , .(rank_mean = mean(rank), rank_median = median(rank)), 
  by = c("company", "type", "h", "metric")
]
```

